page.title: 13BUS ROUTES IN THE AREA
page.content: Buses coming from Hartlepool pass through Hutton Henry to Durham,Bishop Auckland and Sunderland. There is a special bus for the children attending Wellfield School in Wingate. Those buses passing through Station Town go to Stockton ,Sunderland, Durham,Bishop Auckland and Hartlepool. The traffic survey on June 17th showed 13 cars and 3 buses drove through Hutton Henry.Most villagers have a car because they need to travel to other towns to do shopping, work and for entertainment.The railways in the area have already been dismantled and there is now a threat that some of the bus services will be discontinued. The nearest mainline railway station is eleven miles away at Durham City.About 7miles away there is Hartlepool which also has a railway station but this is a branch line.
